column4: Hello! I've tryied tu install ubuntu 11.10 32 bit on my netbook (I used unetbootin to transfer iso on my usb pendrive) but when I boot installation from my pendrive it starts a console "BusyBox" built-in shell o_O can anyone help me?
what's the exact error you are getting ?
i have no error in dmesg | tail too :/
thank you eheh strange thing o.O my debian linux installation worked o.o
i tryed to burn the image again and I got an error when i try to install ubuntu from my USB pendrive --> SYSLINUX - No DEFAULT or UI configuration directive found!
did you format the pendrive before you were burning the image again ?
than there might be some prob with the iso file that you are using..
i've got an idea...i'll check md5
there are only 3 possiblities for such kind of probs, 1. prob with pendrive, (which i think is not there) 2. improper image 3.Problem in burning the image.
with debian iso worked (same pendrive, same unetbootin pc, same installation pc) O_o
